caption:
Faced with a life-threatening heart attack and his wife’s battle with cancer, Gabriel Lee turned to Harvard’s Lifestyle Medicine course for answers. The transformative journey that followed redefined his approach to health and wellness, guiding him through personal and professional challenges to become the best version of himself. 

To read Gabriel's full story, click the link in the bio or visit https://emrt.us/2g3

#EmeritusBlogs #Harvard #WellnessJourney #Healthcare #LearnerSuccess #StudentSpeak
